His fatalism made him feel that no matter what he did, the outcome would be the same.
From her perspective, the project was a success despite the challenges.
Meditation can lead to a state of enlightenment.
The sports commentator provided insightful analysis during the game.
The progress in medical research has been remarkable.
The mortality rate in the region has decreased significantly over the past decade.
We need to accelerate the development of this new technology to stay competitive.
